text: Dako tomara taderake tadera pitr paricaye; allahara nikata eta'i besi n'yayasangata. Atahpara yadi tomara tadera pitr paricaya na jana, tabe tara tomadera dini bha'i ebam bandhu. Ara e byapare tomara kono anicchakrta bhula karale tomadera kono aparadha ne'i; kintu tomadera antara ya sbecchaya kareche (ta aparadha), ara allah ksamasila, parama dayalu
